import "../styles/Board.css"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import scarlet from "../images/scarlet.PNG"; // Import the image URL export default function Board() { useEffect(() => { const rooms = ["study", "hall", "lounge", "library", "billiard", "dinning", "conservatory", "ballroom", "kitchen"]; const room_position = rooms[Math.floor(Math.random() * 9)]; console.log(room_position); }, []); return (
); }
